thread.title: Norway-based striker Mahatma Otoo grateful to Ghana coach Avram Grant for 'advisory' role
thread.title_full: Norway-based striker Mahatma Otoo grateful to Ghana coach Avram Grant for 'advisory' role

title: Norway-based striker Mahatma Otoo grateful to Ghana coach Avram Grant for 'advisory' role
text:
Sports News | 21 October 2015 20:25 CET Norway-based striker Mahatma Otoo grateful to Ghana coach Avram Grant for 'advisory' role - www.ghanasoccernet.com Mahatma Otoo of Ghana during the 2015 Africa Cup of Nations Ghana training session ahead of their semi-final match against Equatorial Guinea at the La Paz Stadium in Malabo, Equatorial Guinea on 2 February 2015 Â©Barry Aldworth/BackpagePix 
Norway-based striker Mahatma Otoo says Ghana coach Avram Grant has played a pivotal role in his career growth. 
Otoo stayed with relegated Sogndal and helped them to make a quick return to the Eliteserien. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
